title: How Are New Products and Services Developed in Businesses?
summary: The article discusses the importance of considering target market when developing new products. It highlights that developing products for existing customers is less risky than introducing new products to new markets.  The article suggests that greater marketing efforts are needed for new markets to establish company credibility and launch a new product.

title: Consumer Products
summary: George Washington Carver was a prominent scientist who dedicated his career to improving Southern agriculture. He focused on developing new uses for crops like peanuts and teaching farmers better soil management practices. Carver's work played a significant role in uplifting Southern farmers and promoting sustainable agricultural practices.
product_or_process: Peanut products and soil improvement methods

title: The Pioneer Womanâ€™s 3 new Walmart-exclusive kitchen appliances are under $60 and available to shop now
summary: The Pioneer Woman, Ree Drummond, has released three new kitchen appliances in a trendy Linen Speckle colorway: a 2-slice toaster, a 6-quart programmable slow cooker, and a 6-quart pressure cooker. These appliances offer various functions, including toasting, slow cooking, pressure cooking, sauteing, steaming, warming, and rice-making. The new colorway adds a touch of nostalgia and modernity to kitchens, with its neutral tone and wood-tone trim.

title: New iMac
summary: Rumors suggest that Apple is working on a larger iMac model, potentially a 30-inch or larger display with new Apple Silicon processors.  The new model is expected to feature a thinner design, a smaller chin, and a larger display with ProMotion and mini-LED technology, though details about its actual size and features are still unclear.  While Apple has stated they are not working on a 27-inch model, recent rumors point to a release sometime in 2025.
